application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of a rear roof extension, involving an increase in the ridge height by 173mm; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of existing back addition; installation of a rooflight in the front roofslope; installation of new double glazed timber windows to replace all existing; installation of a new main front entrance door to replace existing; installation of a new metal entrance gate to replace existing timber gate; erection of a new low level brick-built front boundary wall with metal railings on top, following the removal of existing front boundary wall and timber fence above; removal and infilling of 1no. existing window, to the rear elevation at ground floor level; partial excavation of 290mm beneath the footprint of the main building and lowering of the rear part of ground floor level, in connection with the formation of internal stairs leading to the proposed single storey rear extension.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
